name: Free Flying Fighter Truck Call on Duty the City Hero
name_original: Free Flying Fighter Truck Call on Duty the City Hero
description:
Free Flying Fighter Truck Call on Duty the City Hero

Free to Play & Download on GOOGLE Play Store.

Flying Firetruck City Pilot 3D is another marvelous addition to simulation games from FWD.COM, having a lot of addictive simulators on trucking industry.
Have you ever had the dream to become a Fireman? Now you can! Play Firefighter Simulator 3D and save citizens from dangerous fires!
This game is perfect for you! You can test your airplane pilot skills and motor driving ability at the same time.
Speed up by switching on the turbo engines. Avoid crashing into the skyscapers of the city buildings.
In the finest combination of airborne motor racing games and carriage stunt games, run on the runway and fly your motorcar around the city to perform multiple stunts and drifts.

Act fast and drive rash towards any fire emergency happen in the city. As first responder take your fire fighter crew towards the building on fire or some highway accident reported.
Playing this Flying Firetruck City Pilot 3D you need to do some city parking and city driving but be aware of slippery snowy road terrain.
Install now and feel the best airplane flight experience!

Key Features

- Superb 2 fire trucks with different horsepower engine and customization
- 20 Different levels
- Large city map with multiple buildings
- Superb background music and sound to enhance your gaming experience
- Test your Pickup Truck Driving Skills
- Improve Airplane Flight Ability
- Easy and Free to use
- No WiFi? No Problem.
- Offline Play
